properties.Observation: 200m of this canal has been concreted (W=1.2m, H=1.2m). The remaining section has suffered sever bank erosion. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams.
properties.Description: Dry rubble packing (rubble size over 225mm) boulders locally found/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Villagers says that although the point where this canal joins the main canal is built of concrete, it is not up to the water flow during the rainy season.
properties.Description: Dry rubble packing (rubble size over 225mm) boulders locally found/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.
properties.Description: Dry rubble packing (rubble size over 225mm) boulders locally found/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%
